overview: Dreaming Tel Aviv is an Israeli punk documentary. 'Cyanide' - A punk band of three 17-year-old teenagers is getting ready for the launching of their first album. During their time of self-discovery, we get to peek into their lives and relationships. While the three 'dream' of their new grown-up lives and attempt to escape childhood, it is revealed that they are still prisoners of their past and present reality.
tagline: DREAMING IS NOT SO EASY IN THE BIG CITY
title: Dreaming Tel Aviv
